title: Large Canvas Laundry Bag Drawstring Burlap Bag Santa Sack Student Storage Bag Travel Bag Laundry Backpack Suitable For Student Apartment Family Storage『35"X 25"』
features: 【Canvas Fabric Material】: The drawstring bag is made of canvas fabric,tear-resistant and durable. Laundry bag worked well for hanging and holding clothes, foldable and High density. lightweight , does not take up space, easy to carry.
【Capacity Measures】: Jumbo size: 35''*25''. The jumbo bag can store a large amount of clothing and bedding; you can also use it as pet storage bag, such as pet mat, pet nest and other pet supplies.

【Backpack Design】: The laundry bag has adjustable shoulder straps and soft shoulder pads, relief your shoulder from heavy weights and not easily slips off,you will feel more comfortable when you on the way home or to the laundromat, up and down the stairs.

【More Details】: Reinforcement double seam on inside edges to ensure that laundry bag edge is not easy to crack; The drawstring and the spring lock will effectively fix the bag and prevent items from overflowing; Laundry bag has 2 metal holes, you can hang it on wall or door as a laundry hamper.
【Widely Usage & Easy to Clean】: This bag can be used as a laundry bag, storage bag during your travel, camping, dorm. You can choose hand wash or machine wash when the laundry bag looks dirty.
description: 1. This bag is a multi-purpose backpack; it not only a laundry bag, but also a travel bag, fitness backpack, toy storage bag, suitable for home and dorms use; Used as a sports backpack, you can carry luggage when camping, or you canuse as shopping bag when go shopping, large capacity and easy to carry!

2. Two-capacity design: The laundry backpack has a large enough capacity. It is enough to put your clothes, blankets, sleeping bags and other items you need when you go outdoors or camping; the small bag can put some urgent items and delicate items.

3. The stitching edge of the laundry backpack is double-threaded, which makes the side not easy to crack, and the shoulder strap is not easy to break, which will prolong the backpacks lifespan, you can store your clothes and other items with confidence.

4. This jumbo bag can be used in the family. It is suitable for high school and college dorms. It is convenient for students to store clothes and bring it go home or to laundromat. The small bags can be store shoes, socks or Laundry liquid and other items.
1. Product Name: Laundry Bag / Laundry Backpack
